title: THINGS YOU CAN DO BEFORE YOU START YOUR HOMESTEAD | Start Homesteading Where You Are!

subtasks: Read about purchasing land and property

tasks.task: Practice homesteading skills in current living situation
subtasks: Raise small livestock (e.g., chickens, rabbits, quails)
Use a bokashi bucket for countertop composting
Learn and practice homesteading skills like canning, cheese making, sewing, cooking, fermenting, etc.
Volunteer or assist at a mentor's homestead
Learn animal husbandry, gardening, and indoor skills

tasks.task: Develop a plan for the dream homestead
subtasks: Research and decide on preferred animals
Create a budget for future purchases
Participate in local communities (e.g., farmers markets) to gather information
Evaluate potential homestead locations based on factors like soil, climate, and community
